children.text:
• While using RailYatri Android app, we would collect & store following information:
	• Email Addresses: We automatically read & collect your email addresses available on your android phone.We need email addresses to send you email for train ticket status updates, Invoices & other communications. We do not share this with any third parties. 
	• Phone Number: We collect phone number only when you explicitly give it to us. This is needed to call you for completing our services such as serving food on train, sending m-tickets. Phone Number is also needed for unique identity to help us give you RailYatri cash in your RailYatri closed wallet within the app. 
	• SMS or Message Logs: We may store your train ticket SMS on our server to notify you with train ticket status changes or to inform you about other services for your travel. 
	• External account information: We may collect & store external account information such as your external email address . 
	• GPS location & City: We may track your current GPS location & city to offer you personalized travel related news & information such as buses , trains, hospitals around your location. 
	• Device Make,operator name: We collect device type for you to optimise certain features for your device type. 
	• Network type: We may collect this information as few network types behave differently during train travel in India. 
	• Operating System Version Code & Version Name: We may collect operating system version name & version code to optimize certain features for your OS version. 
	• Device ID: We may collect your device id such as IMEI number to help us uniquely identify you.This is needed as many users carry more than one devices to access RailYatri app. 
	• App Version code and app version name: We may collect app version code and app version name to help support you better. 
	• The above information may also be used for internal analysis on our users' demographics, interests, and behavior patterns to help us better understand, protect and serve our users.This information is analysed on an aggregated basis. None of this information is shared with any third parties & may be periodically deleted from our servers when not needed. 
	• If you chose to transact with us we may collect information about your transaction behavior, such as your mobile number, billing address, a credit / debit card number and a credit / debit card expiration date and/ or other payment instrument details. 

• When you search for a specific train, station or any such travel information using the app, we may collect certain metadata (i.e when it was searched, how many times it was searched etc.)
